content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #94

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Add hub.lease_seconds to Intent Verification Request Example

Submitted by @MichaelTClifton on behalf of @isaacvetter (isaac@epic.com )
Chapter/section: Intent Verification Request Example
Url:
Type: NEG :exclamation: Correction
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Add hub.lease_seconds to Intent Verification Request Example

Comment: The hub.lease_seconds parameter is required in the Intent Verification exchange, but isn't in the example. The example should be updated to include this parameter.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #94

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
